title: Availability of long-term finance for infrastructure projects challenge: Official - Economic Times
content: Availability of long-term finance for infrastructure projects challenge: Official  Economic Times
description: Speaking at a webinar organised by BCCI, state-run IIFCL Managing Director P R Jaishankar said, "Majority of funds for infrastructure used to come from banks. Presently, banks have been replaced by non-banking finance companies and infrastructure financing companies."
